tagline_en: Evidence-driven auto-evolution layer for Agent Skills.
tagline_zh: 面向 Agent Skills 的证据驱动自动进化层。
overview_en: Auto-Evolution Agent Skills adds a low-noise learning loop to any skills library. It captures real usage, drafts reusable knowledge, and produces actionable improvement notes without heavy processing.
overview_zh: Auto-Evolution Agent Skills 为任意技能库提供低噪声学习闭环，基于真实使用生成草稿和可执行的改进建议，并保持极低运行开销。
features_en: Event stream with session-local summaries for fast analysis
Context filters (TTL + ignore/force patterns) to reduce false positives
Auto drafts for failures and session insights
Validation queue for risky or outdated guidance
features_zh: 事件流 + 会话摘要，快速生成改进线索
上下文过滤（TTL + 忽略/强制规则）降低误报
失败与会话收尾自动生成草稿
验证队列用于复查高风险指导
